title: Tentacle Spike
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||Adds damage to [[auxiliary]] tentacle slap.||One of your tentacles bears a spike. |- |2||Adds more damage to [[auxiliary]] tentacle slap.||One of your tentacles bears a nasty spike. |- |3||Adds most damage to [[auxiliary]] tentacle slap.||One of your tentacles bears a large vicious spike. |- | colspan="3" | '''Damage:''' 5 + rank
'''Chance''': 100% * (30 + XL)/59 per melee attack |- | colspan="3" | '''Species notes:''' Exclusive to [[octopode]]s. Octopodes may also temporarily induce rank 3 of this mutation with [[Beastly Appendage]]. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Good_mutations|Good mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Good Mutations]]
